sentences.en: A Machiavellian plot was suspected.
sentences.cn: 人们怀疑背后有不可告人的阴谋。

sentences.en: a two-acre plot of land
sentences.cn: 一块两英亩的土地

sentences.en: a vegetable plot
sentences.cn: 一块菜地

sentences.en: an assassination plot
sentences.cn: 一宗暗杀阴谋

sentences.en: But as the investigation continued, the plot began to thicken.
sentences.cn: 但是随着调查的继续深入，情况开始变得复杂起来。

sentences.en: Can you follow the plot so far?
sentences.cn: 目前为止剧情你能看得懂吗？

sentences.en: His short stories tend to be weak on plot.
sentences.cn: 他的短篇小说往往情节牵强。

sentences.en: many people believe that he is feeling the strain or has lost the plot.
sentences.cn: 许多人认为他正经历巨大压力或者已经无能为力了。

sentences.en: many people believe that he is feeling the strain or has lost the plot.
sentences.cn: 许多人认为他正经历巨大压力或者已经无能为力了。

sentences.en: Plot a graph of height against age.
sentences.cn: 绘制一张身高与年龄对照的曲线图。

sentences.en: Reports of the plot of this unusual film tend to excite revulsion.
sentences.cn: 有关这部不同寻常电影的情节的报道常常令人生厌。

sentences.en: Sadly, the film is let down by an excessively simple plot.
sentences.cn: 遗憾的是，过于简单的情节使得这部电影令人失望。

sentences.en: The court heard how she and her lover hatched a plot (= planned a plot ) to kill her husband.
sentences.cn: 法庭听取了她和情人密谋杀害她丈夫的案情。

sentences.en: The dialogue is amusing but the plot is weak.
sentences.cn: 对白逗趣但是情节薄弱。

sentences.en: The film is spoilt by unrealistic contrivances of plot.
sentences.cn: 这部电影被不实际的牵强情节给毁了。

sentences.en: The minister was found guilty of plotting the downfall of the government.
sentences.cn: 那名部长被判犯有阴谋颠覆政府罪。

sentences.en: The plot often borders on farce.
sentences.cn: 情节常常近乎荒诞。

sentences.en: The plot seems contrived.
sentences.cn: 情节看起来不真实。

sentences.en: The plot to overthrow the military government was foiled (= prevented from being successful ) .
sentences.cn: 推翻军政府的秘密计划被挫败了。

sentences.en: The plot unfolds at a plodding pace.
sentences.cn: 情节缓慢展开。

sentences.en: The plot was a little confusing.
sentences.cn: 情节有些费解。

sentences.en: the story of a woman who plots revenge
sentences.cn: 一个女人策划报复的故事

sentences.en: They had plotted to blow up the White House.
sentences.cn: 他们曾密谋炸毁白宫。

sentences.en: We discover that Jack isn’t as innocent as he seems, as the plot unfolds (= gradually becomes clearer ) .
sentences.cn: 随着情节的展开，我们发现杰克并不像表面上看起来那么清白。

sentences.en: We had the people immediately concerned in the plot.
sentences.cn: 我们让故事情节与人们息息相关。

sentences.en: We plot about eight points on the graph.
sentences.cn: 我们在图表上绘制出大约8个点的曲线。

sentences.en: We were trying to plot the course of the submarine.
sentences.cn: 我们试图标绘出潜艇的航线图。

words.tran_cn: 策划（plot的过去分词）；划分；绘制…的地图

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)丧失理解能力，无能为力
划分；分配；描绘，提出…纲要
容积率；地积比率；建造比率
样地；（植林试验）标准地；样区；样图

trans.tran_en: the events that form the main story of a book, film, or play

trans.tran_cn: 图谋，计划，设计情节，标绘出位置，绘制
trans.tran_en: to make a secret plan to harm a person or organization, especially a political leader or government
to make a secret plan to harm a person or organization, especially a political leader or government
to make a secret plan to harm a person or organization, especially a political leader or government
